item.description: Time to put on the dancing shoes, and get out of the house. Lots of great people, and new faces having a great time. Large dance floor / Hot & Cold Hor D'ouevres / Great Music Plenty of free parking / $7 cover till 8:30 then $10 after so get there early!  Doors open at 8PM   Proper dress required.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have some tables reserved with WhatsAngeloDoing on them
item.why: It's been a crazy winter and we gotta get back to some serious fun! This is the kick off of the season, and we hope to get some other great ideas to be doing all year.
item.name: Come out of hibernation and dance spring in!
